scripts.m:deprecations: docker-compose exec -T api python -W always manage.py
scripts.pip:install:devtools: docker-compose --file docker-compose-devtools.yml run -T --rm devtools sh -c "pip uninstall --requirement docker/devtools/requirements.lock --yes && pip install --requirement docker/devtools/requirements.txt && pip freeze > docker/devtools/requirements.lock"
scripts.pip:install:api: docker-compose run -T --entrypoint "" --rm api sh -c "pip uninstall --requirement docker/api/requirements.lock --yes && pip install --requirement docker/api/requirements.txt && pip freeze > docker/api/requirements.lock"
